程序包 org.modelmapper.spi

接口 ValueReader<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - source type
    所有已知实现类:
    JsonElementValueReader, JsonNodeValueReader, MapValueReader, ProtobufValueReader, RecordValueReader
    public interface ValueReader<T>
    Reads values from a source. Allows for integration with 3rd party libraries.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      修饰符和类型 接口 说明
      static class  ValueReader.Member<T>
      A member of a given source

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      java.lang.Object get​(T source, java.lang.String memberName)
      Returns the value from the source object for the memberName.
      ValueReader.Member<T> getMember​(T source, java.lang.String memberName)
      Returns the ValueReader.Member from the source within given memberName.
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> memberNames​(T source)
      Returns all member names for the source object, else null if the source has no members.

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        java.lang.Object get​(T source,
                     java.lang.String memberName)
        Returns the value from the source object for the memberName.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the memberName is invalid for the source

      • getMember

        ValueReader.Member<T> getMember​(T source,
                                java.lang.String memberName)
        Returns the ValueReader.Member from the source within given memberName.
        参数:
        source - the source object
        memberName - the name of member

      • memberNames

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> memberNames​(T source)
        Returns all member names for the source object, else null if the source has no members.
